sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"成熟，长成"之意。
means: mature ： 指生物自然发育成熟或丰满或使其能起正常作用，还可指人获得智慧、经验或变得世故。
ripen ： 侧重已到长生成熟的顶点。
age ： 一般指使人过早成熟，强调已走向衰老。
develop ： 侧重使某一种类或个体潜在本能进化完全，词义比mature广泛。

sentence.Network_en: This helps to ripen new growth and makes it flower profusely.
sentence.Network_cn: 这有助于新生发植株的成熟，令其开出繁茂的花朵。

sentence.Network_en: The pears will sweeten as they ripen.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 花语_互动百科 ... 脉动（ Pulsation） 成熟（ripen）（ Ripen） 统一（ Unity）.
花语_互动百科 ... 活力（ Vitality） 结实（ripen）（ Ripening） 沉默（ Taciturnity）.
英语常用的词根词缀_百度知道 ... quicken（ 使快速）, ripen（ 使成熟）, widen（ 使变宽）.
奥斯特瓦尔德成熟;Ostwald... ... 1) 熟成; ripening;maturation 2) 熟化; ripening;ageing;maturing 4) 瓦; watt.

list.abs: ...颗粒表面上，使颗粒继续长大的过程。奥氏成熟过程包括溶解、扩散和沉积等步骤。由于此过程纯属于物理过程，故亦称物理成熟（physical ripening）。又由于此过程先于，又称第一成熟（first ripening）。
ripening 成熟ripening period 成熟期ripening process 成熟过程
artificial parthenogenesis人工孤雌生殖artificial ripening人工催熟artificial transposon人工转座子
农业词汇英... ... physiological requirement 生理要求 physiological ripening 生理成熟 physiological selectivity 生理选择性.

means.word_mean: 使...成为,使...变为,使...适应于

entry.def: When crops ripen or when the sun ripens them, they become ripe.

example.ex: I'm waiting for the apples to ripen...
You can ripen the tomatoes on a sunny windowsill.
example.tran: 把西红柿放在有阳光的窗台上可以让它们成熟。

means.word_mean: 1. cause to ripen or develop fully;

auth_sentence.content: The blooming boy is ripen'd into man.
auth_sentence.res_content: The blooming boy is ripen'd into man.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The blooming boy is ripen'd into man.

auth_sentence.content: Each banana in the bunch should thus ripen at a unique rate.
auth_sentence.res_content: Each banana in the bunch should thus ripen at a unique rate.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Each banana in the bunch should thus ripen at a unique rate.

auth_sentence.content: The first blossoms of that literature which was to ripen into so rich a harvest.
auth_sentence.res_content: The first blossoms of that literature which was to ripen into so rich a harvest.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The first blossoms of that literature which was to ripen into so rich a harvest.

sentences.en: When the summer crop is ripening, the autumn crop has to be sowed.
sentences.cn: 夏季作物成熟时, 就得播种秋季作物。
